ComicInfo.Title: The Terror of the Warrior Toads!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Terror of the Warrior Toads!: The Toad Warriors' eggs have been stolen by the Malok and Randy has to take up the Toad Warriors' cause by defeating their best fighter Targo in combat. Unfortunately, this earns Randy the attentions of Princess Walla-Mae! Working with Targo, Randy battles the three-headed dragon sent by the Malok to guard the eggs. The eggs are saved, Targo wins the hand of Walla-Mae and Randy returns to Earth.
ComicInfo.Characters: the Malok,Tesca,Gemel,Edrice,Randy O'Donnell,Wallar the War-King,Toad Warriors,Targo,Princess Walla-Mae
